title: Operators
text:
Given a set of N integer A = {1, 2, 3, …, N} and a integer S, 
your task is find a way to insert an operator ‘+’ or ‘-‘ to every neighbor pair of A, 
that the result of the expression after insert equal to S.InputA single line, N and S (1 ≤ N ≤ 500, |S| ≤ 125250)OutputIf there are way(s) to insert, outputs any of them, otherwise outputs “Impossible” (without quotes).ExampleInput:9 5Output:1-2+3-4+5-6+7-8+9Input:5 6Output:Impossible
